posts.title: About national flag burning...here's a list of countries that with laws that don't allow it.

twitter.content:
@mtaibbi For reference, here are all the countries with laws against burning their country's flags:

Argentina – Up to 1 year prison or fines.
Armenia – Community service or up to 1 year in prison.
Austria – Fines or up to 6 months prison.
Azerbaijan – Up to 1 year prison.
Brazil – Fines
